XZQMC5 = #{xzqmc5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select:
select xzq_id5 groupid, isParent isParent, p_xzqid parentid,
CONCAT(t.xzqmc5,(if(sign((gridcou))>'0',CONCAT('(<span style=''font-weight:bold;color:blue;margin-right:0px;''>',(gridcou),')'),'')) ) name, t.xzqmc5 groupname from (select a.xzq_id5, p_xzqid, a.xzqmc5, case when (select count(*) from em_xzq_view s where s.p_xzqid = a.xzq_id5) > 0 then 'true' else 'false' end isParent, (select count(1) from em_xzq_view where xzq_id5 in (select xzq_id5 from em_xzq_view l where l.p_xzqid = a.xzq_id5)) gridcou from em_xzq_view a where a.p_xzqid = #{parentid} order by a.xzq_id5) t
